summary: Provides utilities to read and interpret simulation histogram files generated by sim_telarray (including compressed .zst files), construct structured histogram objects, and calculate derived performance quantities such as system trigger rates, observation times, uncertainties, and related metadata while supporting configurable energy ranges, view cones, and effective area estimations.
business_intent: Enables CTA researchers and engineers to extract quantitative performance metrics from simulated telescope array data, facilitating design validation, sensitivity studies, and operational planning for the Cherenkov Telescope Array.
